mapper.select: SELECT aa.steem_id, IFNULL( bb.sp, 0 ) AS sp, aa.totalToken, IFNULL( bb.token, 0 ) AS token, aa.agent_time FROM ( SELECT steem_id, SUM( token ) AS totalToken, agent_time FROM ${account} WHERE log_time <= #{date} GROUP BY steem_id ) AS aa LEFT JOIN ( SELECT steem_id, sp, token FROM ${account} WHERE log_time = #{date} ) AS bb ON aa.steem_id = bb.steem_id ORDER BY bb.sp DESC, aa.totalToken DESC
SELECT log_time FROM ${account} WHERE id=(SELECT MAX(id) FROM cnstm);
